channel.title: Is it possible to make new worlds with ports?
channel.description:
Just wondering because I was thinking about doing this myself...
Anyways I was thinking about copying the server.java extention file and remodifying its property, which would allow the player to switch worlds between ports or i could probably import ports in the same file extention. Not sure if it will work though...
But my point is. Is it possible?

item.title: Is it possible to make new worlds with ports?
item.dc:creator: @zonus_warrior zonus warrior
item.description:
@zonus_warrior wrote:

i’v ran 5 ports at the same time using the same server and they all used the same character

Read full topic
